channel.title: Flash Games & More [In Progress Thread]
channel.description:
So I've decided to make a thread here, because it's kind of slow in this section, and I'm making like 5-6 flash projects at once (Not all are games though). Most projects [u]will[/u] have an online demo for everyone to enjoy. But you have to remember, they aren't finished, and they are alpha/beta's.
Project 1:
[center]Heart Repair [hr][/center]
[b]What is it?:[/b] This is a multi-puzzle game that I started a few weeks ago and then abandoned. One day I saw it, got inspired and kept working on it. I'm currently working on the second level, which is time consuming because of all the checks and placement values :)
[b]What are the challenges?:[/b] It starts out as a puzzle, where you must put the pieces of the heart into the right position (this isn't very hard ;) ). Once you finish that you move on to level 2. You have to put stitches on the heart to stop it from bleeding. I believe I've added all the stitches that I want on to the heart, but I haven't coded them all :o.
[b]Etc:[/b] The game is red/black themed, because what better colors for a heart? :P I haven't been writing the [u]best[/u] code I could be for it, but that's why it's a beta. I do need idea's for level 3, I was thinking maybe putting the heart into the body or something? I haven't fully decided.
[b]Live Demo:[/b] Just like I said, there's a live demo up and running. [url=http://nyx-online.info/files/heartGame/heartGame.html] Alpha version[/url] - This was the very start of the project, so it's no where near done, or up to date. [url=http://nyx-online.info/files/heartGame/heartGameR2.html] Beta R1[/url] - Here's my first official 'beta' of the game. It's still only up to the second level. And I've made improvements on my version since release (such as not having to click the check option on the stitches/pieces).
Please tell me what you think, and what I should add/edit/modify. Flaming/Hatred won't be tolerated. I know flash is "Dying" but I don't care, there's still plenty of sites that are willing to host flash games.
[hr]
Project 2:
[center]Imgur Vote Cannon [hr][/center]
[b]What is it?:[/b] The game is based off of http://imgur.com/ and how people on there act. I haven't mapped out the entire game yet, but there are 2 cannons (game modes) you can pick. Upvote cannon, and Downvote cannon. I was thinking something like something would randomly fly on the screen (like a picture of a cat, or 'selfie'). And if you're using the upvote cannon, you upvote cute cats and how-to guides, and don't hit things like selfies, and reposts. If you're using the downvote cannon, you do the opposite.
[b]What are the challenges?:[/b] This hasn't been mapped out yet..
[b]Etc:[/b] Also hasn't been mapped out yet.
[b]Live Demo:[/b] Not online yet
-More projects to be posted (as soon as I find em ;) )

item.title: Flash Games & More [In Progress Thread]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So I’ve decided to make a thread here, because it’s kind of slow in this section, and I’m making like 5-6 flash projects at once (Not all are games though). Most projects will have an online demo for everyone to enjoy. But you have to remember, they aren’t finished, and they are alpha/beta’s.

Project 1:

[center]Heart Repair
[hr][/center]

What is it?:
This is a multi-puzzle game that I started a few weeks ago and then abandoned. One day I saw it, got inspired and kept working on it. I’m currently working on the second level, which is time consuming because of all the checks and placement values

What are the challenges?:
It starts out as a puzzle, where you must put the pieces of the heart into the right position (this isn’t very hard ). Once you finish that you move on to level 2. You have to put stitches on the heart to stop it from bleeding. I believe I’ve added all the stitches that I want on to the heart, but I haven’t coded them all :o.

Etc:
The game is red/black themed, because what better colors for a heart? I haven’t been writing the best code I could be for it, but that’s why it’s a beta. I do need idea’s for level 3, I was thinking maybe putting the heart into the body or something? I haven’t fully decided.

Live Demo:
Just like I said, there’s a live demo up and running.
Alpha version - This was the very start of the project, so it’s no where near done, or up to date.
Beta R1 - Here’s my first official ‘beta’ of the game. It’s still only up to the second level. And I’ve made improvements on my version since release (such as not having to click the check option on the stitches/pieces).

Please tell me what you think, and what I should add/edit/modify. Flaming/Hatred won’t be tolerated. I know flash is “Dying” but I don’t care, there’s still plenty of sites that are willing to host flash games.

[hr]

Project 2:

[center]Imgur Vote Cannon
[hr][/center]

What is it?:
The game is based off of http://imgur.com/ and how people on there act. I haven’t mapped out the entire game yet, but there are 2 cannons (game modes) you can pick. Upvote cannon, and Downvote cannon. I was thinking something like something would randomly fly on the screen (like a picture of a cat, or ‘selfie’). And if you’re using the upvote cannon, you upvote cute cats and how-to guides, and don’t hit things like selfies, and reposts. If you’re using the downvote cannon, you do the opposite.

What are the challenges?:
This hasn’t been mapped out yet…

Etc:
Also hasn’t been mapped out yet.

Live Demo:
Not online yet

-More projects to be posted (as soon as I find em )

Read full topic
